modName: Red and Black or White Vampire Eyes for DG or V
summary: Replaces vampire eye texture from Dawnguard DLC or Vanilla if using only first texture.
descriptionHtml:
Wow, over 2000 downloads, thank you so much everyone! :)

I didn't like having big glowing yellow/amber eyes, and I've always loved the idea of having red eyes as a vampire, so i got a picture of an eye, shrunk it to the size of the original eye texture, and then a tiny bit more as the iris was just a tad big for popular taste, and colored and darkened it accordingly.

The red eyes are not too bright which i didn't like and also are not so dark the glow is not visible, I hope you enjoy.

v1: Uploaded large red iris.
v2: Shrunk iris a little bit more and darkened around eye a bit.
v3: Slightly edited original black/red eye and added red iris with white eye.

Install:
Unzip the folder and pick whether you would like the red iris with a black or white eye and move the textures folder into the Data folder of your skyrim dir eg "c:/whatever/skyrim folder/Data" and overwrite if necessary necessary.

ENJOY! :)
author: BrendanatorX
